vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_16.sol#7-18):
	External calls:
	- success = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_16.sol#13)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_16.sol#17)
	- userBalances (patch_16.sol#16)
